parts:
"Here" is a 2024 film directed by Robert Zemeckis, reuniting him with Tom Hanks and Robin Wright, who previously collaborated on "Forrest Gump." The movie is based on Richard McGuire's graphic novel and explores the lives of multiple families connected to a single location over generations.

Critics have offered mixed reviews. Rotten Tomatoes notes that while it's encouraging to see Zemeckis return to humanistic storytelling, the film's stagey concept and excessive spectacle diminish its emotional impact. citeturn0search6 The Wall Street Journal highlights the film's unique approach, observing the same plot of land from the age of the dinosaurs to today, but doesn't delve deeply into its emotional resonance. citeturn0search5 Yahoo Entertainment points out that despite the reunion of Hanks, Wright, and Zemeckis, the film falls short in its generational storytelling experiment. citeturn0search2

In summary, "Here" presents an ambitious narrative spanning centuries, but its execution has received a lukewarm response from critics.
